stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Cash Advance Laws in Coral Springs, Florida
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Coral Springs are protected by Florida's comprehensive payday lending regulations, administered by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation's Division of Consumer Finance. Florida recognizes that cash advance loans help with emergency financial situations while providing strong borrower protections.
keyPoints: All payday lenders in Coral Springs must be licensed by the Florida Office of Financial Regulation
You can only have one payday loan at a time in Florida, enforced by statewide database
Single-payment loans are capped at $500 with maximum 10% fee plus $5 verification fee
Installment loans are capped at $1,000 with maximum 8% biweekly fee on outstanding balance
You must wait 24 hours after paying off one loan before taking out another
Loan rollovers and extensions are prohibited by law
If you can't pay on time, you're entitled to a 60-day grace period with free credit counseling
You cannot be criminally prosecuted for an unpaid payday loan
Prepayment penalties are prohibited - you can pay off early without extra cost
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is provided for general educational purposes only and should not be construed as legal or financial advice. Payday loan laws and regulations are subject to change. For the most accurate and up-to-date information about Florida payday loan regulations, please contact the Florida Office of Financial Regulation at (850) 487-9687 or visit flofr.gov. Consult with a licensed financial advisor or attorney regarding your specific situation before making borrowing decisions.

nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Coral Springs location? We also serve these nearby cities:

faq.question: Where is your Coral Springs cash advance location?
faq.answer: Our Coral Springs branch is located at 2847 Sample Road, Suite 160, near beautiful Cypress Lake. We're easily accessible from I-75 Exit 42.

faq.question: What are your hours at the Coral Springs location?
faq.answer: We're open Monday through Friday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Saturday 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Walk-ins welcome!

faq.question: Is Coral Springs a safe neighborhood for cash transactions?
faq.answer: Yes! Coral Springs is known as a very safe, family-oriented community. Our location is secure and we have safe procedures for all cash transactions.

faq.question: Can I get an installment loan instead of a single-payment loan?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer both options. Installment loans go up to $1,000 and allow you to make payments over time (up to 90 days) instead of one lump-sum repayment. This gives you more flexibility.

faq.question: What if I'm deployed or traveling for work?
faq.answer: You can apply online and complete the process before visiting our Coral Springs location, or call us at (954) 555-0312 to discuss your specific situation.
